entity.name: Unoplat Technologies PVT. LTD.
entity.description: Unoplat is a bootstrapped open-source organization based in India, driven by a dedicated team of five professionals. Our mission is to empower individual developers to build enterprise-grade backend systems single-handedly. By focusing on cutting-edge solutions in code context provisioning and cloud-native platforms, we aim to revolutionize backend development, making it more accessible, scalable, and efficient for developers worldwide.

projects.name: Unoplat CodeConfluence
projects.description:
Where Code Meets Clarity.

CodeConfluence aims to be the most deterministic and precise code context provider for any code repository and across multiple such repositories tied through domain. It seeks to become the unified code context provider, which can be integrated with projects like OpenDevin, Devon, Danswer, Continue Dev, and other open-source software, thereby complementing the precision of these frameworks with minimal operational expenditure. This product is live and consumable.

projects.name: Unoplat Core
projects.description: An open-source platform enabling individuals to build a cloud-native, Kubernetes-native, self-hosted enterprise-grade backend. Unoplat Core includes built-in cross-cutting concerns such as infrastructure, security, scalability, and observability. It offers ready-to-deploy templates for streaming applications, batch processing, microservices, BPMN workflows, and generative AI applications. The product is in alpha and non consumable.
